author: robocopsgonemad
content: hello frens. I am implementing engine_getPayloadV3 for EIP 4844 in besu, basing it on these specs:  https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/blob/main/src/engine/experimental/blob-extension.md

author: robocopsgonemad
content: when the CL calls this, it only passes in a payloadId, but expects the EL to consider the current timestamp when deciding what format to return.

author: robocopsgonemad
content: my understanding is that the EL clock is NOT to be trusted, that we always draw our notion of the current time from the CL

author: robocopsgonemad
content: so I think we need another parameter to this so the CL can provide that timestamp

author: robocopsgonemad
content: am i understanding this right and should I open a PR?

author: robocopsgonemad
content: the other option is we can get the most recent timestamp from the chainhead...
